summary: CUE INFOTAINMENT SYSTEM TOUCH SCREEN MALFUNCTIONS CAUSING DRIVER DISTRACTION AS WELL AS DISCOMFORT . HEATING , NAVIGATION AND RADIO FUNCTIONS OPERATE ERRATICALLY WITHOUT WARNING  AS IF THE SCREEN IS DETECTING A FINGER PRESSING IT AND CAN NOT BE OVERRIDDEN .  THIS IS A DRIVING SAFETY ISSUE ESPECIALLY HERE IN THE MIDWEST WHERE A WEATHER ADVISORY COULD VERY WELL BE MISSED OR THE HEATING AND AIR COULD CAUSE THE WINDSHIELD TO FOG UNCONTROLLABLY.
